text: The men's 10,000 metres event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 18 September. Josephat Machuka finished second, but as he was being passed just before the finish, he deliberately punched at the eventual winner Haile Gebrselassie during the final sprint and was disqualified.BBC Sports, May 28, 2004: Olympic countdown: 73 daysYouTube video: 1992 World Junior Championships 10000m final sprint Machuka hit Haile ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Haile Gebrselassie ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Josephat Ndeti ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Yasuyuki Watanabe ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 10,000 metres
